document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 95-15
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, AMENDING THE OFFICIAL ZONING MAP OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON BY RECLASSIFYING CERTAIN REAL PROPERTY HEREIN DESCRIBED FROM THE PD PLANNED DEVELOPMENT ZONE DISTRICT TO THE PC PLANNED COMMUNITY ZONE DISTRICT ON 17.39 ACRES LOCATED ON THE WEST SIDE OF FLOSDEN ROAD BETWEEN WORLD MARINE ESTATES AND THE SUMMERFIELD/CANYON CREEK ESTATES NEIGHBORHOODS (ZC95-01)
